com.zcking.furyengine.engine

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zcking.furyengine.engine.Scene

  • public class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
    A container for common "scene" items (e.g. mesh collection, skybox, lighting objects, etc.). Can be used to simply game implementations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Scene()
      Constructs a new Scene and initializes the meshMap collection and fog.

      • setGameObjects

        public void setGameObjects(GameObject[] gameItems)
        Seeds the game objects from an array. Automatically maps the meshes to game objects, based on the stored meshes in the objects.
        Parameters:
        gameItems - The array of GameObject to store.
